Blog.post: Well today i had to cancel Humane Society because i was not able to get the car. Cable 10 is still on for tonight. I have to go for now. Have a great day!

Well we did the 30 hour famine this past weekend and everyone had a great time.....I have a bunch of things to do this week...Jo is getting her teeth fixed so she will be out tomorrow......but i have everything covered....i have to do the Humane Society and Cable 10 tomorrow.....i cannot believe that in a month from now it will be my last day at the Youth Volunteer Corps. Things are going to fast....and i feel that i don't have enough time to do the things i want to do.....Well have a good day everyone!
Well this is my new website for my friends only because of the crap i was getting on the other one. I will put up the comments so i can talk to you guys on this website and on MSN messager.

3 MORE DAYS UNTIL I LEAVE ONTARIO AND GOT BACK TO NEW BRUNSWICK Well things have been busy at work and i have been busy packing my stuff. It is amazing how time went by fast. I made a thank you card for the EEC Staff. The staff wants me to be at the staff meeting on Thursday. I can't believe that in three day i will be graduating. College has been so great and i have learned so much in the last two years about life and about relationships in my life. Anyways thats all for now. Have a great day!

Fireworks Well things have been a little boring....but tonight i am going to tom's for the fireworks.....i am taking Katie, Brandon and Cody with me. It is going to be an amazing. I can't wait anyways have a good day!

2 MORE WEEKS UNTIL I LEAVE ONTARIO AND GOT BACK TO NEW BRUNSWICK Well things have been going good but fast and busy. We have a YAC meeting today....this will be the last time that i will there.....I am going to miss everyone....I have so much to do in the next two weeks....i have to pack as much stuff as i can this weekend....Anways i have to go.....because i am busy of course......have a good day!

The Sacred Romance By Brent Curtis & John Eldredge Johanna gave me this book to read. I want to get it done before i leave so i have been reading when i can. This is a part of the book in which really made me think "The life of the heart is a place of great mistery. Yet we have many expressions to help us express this flame of the human soul. We describe a person without compassion as "heartless" and we urge him or her to "have a heart". Our despest hurts we call "heartaches" Page 3 "In the end, it doesn't matter how well we have performed or what we have accomplished -a life without heart is not worth living." Page 3 That just made me think a little about my heart and my life. God Bless and have a great day!

Working at a day care today Pam called me on yesterday and ask me if i would help her with her daycare. She need to go to Ottawa this morning and i said yes. So she came and picked me up at 9:00pm. I had to sleep at her house last night which was fine by me. I had the best night sleep in a long time even when the baby woke me up around 5 this morning. I guess it is because it was so quiet. I live down on king street so no matter what time it is there is always noise. So i guess that is what has been keeping me up and why i am not sleeping well. Anyways other then that things went well and i didn't realize until today that i miss being around the little kids. So it was a real nice change. I still like working with the youth more. Anyways have a good day i know i will.

Things are weird and boring for the last few days. I haven't been sleeping well i guess its because of everything that is going on. I started packing last night. I got two boxs full of stuff so far. I didn't realize i have so much stuff. My parents have more of my stuff at their house. Its funny how much crap you can pick up over the years. Tom is having a big fireworks next weekend. Last year they had fireworks going for 45 minutes. I am so happy i am not going to miss it. Its funny how life works and how things are going in my life. I have met the most amazing people here in Brockville even if i don't like Brockville that much. I can't wait until i move back to Fredericton. Brenda is there and she is happy i am moving back too. I miss her she is such a great friend. Amanda is also happy and i will be able to see her more often because she is going to be only and hour and a half drive from Fredericton. Anyways hope everyone has a great day.
What a boring life in the last two days i guess its bacause i had to much fun last weekend.....anyways nothing new but have a good day

I had the most wonderful weekend! Jo, Katie and I went to Charles cottage. Katie and I were out on the water all after-noon. Charles was trying to fix this fishing pole and he caught a big fish and after that Katie wanted to catch one also. She worked hard and did catch one before we left. It was kind of funny and we had a get time. Jo, Katie, Robert, Charles and I went on a boat for a while too. It was great. Jo and Katie got a sun burn but i didn't. Anyways have a good day!

I think I am going CRAZY!!! Well as you can see i am having a bad week. Things have not been going my way! i am job hunting and thats not going well. People here are such ass and now i know why i left here in the first place. Just because i am not 100% french i am being treated different then the others. I have to get to Fredericton as soon as possible. I have been thinking about going to Fredericton and going on welfare but i really don't want to do that. I need a job so bad. Maybe once i get a job i wouldn't feel so out of control with everything. Its my control issue coming out again. I have talked to Brenda in Fredericton and we have talked about getting an apartment together and also with her daughter. Linda who is Brenda's friend is also looking a roommate. I was suppose to live with my aunt but she lives to far away from town and the university. It would take and hour and a half just on the bus plus and hour or so to walk to the last bus stop. Just to much for me! Anyways i have to go because mom is going to pick me up in a few minutes so i have to be ready when she gets here. Have a good day and God Bless you!

Been in New Brunswick for more then a week now! Well i hope things have been going well for everyone. I have been bored so this week i am looking for a summer job. It has been nice to be home but i miss everyone in Brockville too. Hi Brandon, Cody, Bailey and Jo Pott. Well i have to go because i have some things to do. Talk to you later. I will give some of you guys a call tonight. Bye for now. Have a good week!

Moving Again on August 1st! Well is packing once again in the next week or so. I have so much to do plus work. I am moving into an apartment with Brandi and Brenda. On Biggs Street in Fredericton. Have to go because really busy just want you to know whats going on. Talk care everyone! God bless!
I have a new job I am working at Howard Johnson as a maid. I hate it but it better then nothing. Thats about it that is new. Will write more next time! Have a good day!

I am moving again in two months and i have been in NB for month now! Well things have been ok. Still not working and the boss at the place i was going to work said that she will call me next week. What is up that? I am getting pissed with all th crap i am getting here. Some places say they need people but then they don't call me. Man i hate Edmundston people. I have to get back to the big city before i go crazy. I am moving again to Fredericton New Brunswick in two months. I am moving in with Brandi and Brenda which will be great. I can't wait to move. I think my parents don't want me to move again. Mom's said "Well this time she will not be so far away!" I will be about 3 hours from Edmundston. My mom tells me she understands why i don't like Edmundston. Its so small and there is nothing here which pisses me off. I need to be in Fredericton where its nice and big. Brenda was telling me about the amazing Firework show they had for Canada day. I wish i was there to see it. Fredericton is bigger then Brockville and so they had more fireworks then Brockville would have. Sometimes i wished i stayed in Brockville but i wouldn't have more money then i do now. A funny thing happened yesterday. I was playing with my mom's dog and he bit my nose. It still hurts today. The little bugger. Anyways i have to get going. Still have stuff to do before i go. Have a good week!

Lessons to learn! Sometimes you try to help people who you really care for. What happenes when they don't what to help themselves? What are you to do? Well i know someone who tryed to help out these street kids out. She gave them a place to live for a month. She did this so they could pick money and find a place to live. Well last night the teens decided to bring over a friend at 2AM. My friend got a little upset and in the morning told them that they had to leave. So in other words she kicked them out. I totally understand her and her decision. People try to help other people and these other people don't even give a shit. They got a free ride and i guess that is what they wanted. That is all for now. Have a good day! Peace out!

Freezing our butts off in Fredericton! Wow i can't believe that its soooo cold. I had to wear pants and a coat for the last two days. What is up with the weather? Three days ago it was so hot everyone just wanted to die and now it feels like winter. I don't know what is going on but its too weird for me. Its like one minute it was hot and the next minute we are freezing. Anyways have to go. Hope you have a warm day!

Been in Fredericton for a week now! Things have been going well but i can't wait until school starts. I also can't wait to see Brandi. She will be home on the first of September. I have an appointment at the eye doctor on tuesday at 10:30am. I need to get my eyes checked and i need new contact lens. That's all for now. Have a good weekend!

I am now in Fredericton!!!!!! Well things have been going great! I have moved into my apartment today. I love it here! I am so happy to be back here. I did realized that i missed this place so much. I can't wait until school starts. I can't believe that we are in the middle of August already. Well thats all for tonight because i am so tired and i need sleep. Have a good week!

Not moving until August 16th I have decided to move only on the 16th because i need more money. I went to Fredericton with my dad on the 1st to bring some stuff to the apartment. The apartment is great. I love it! It is nice and big. I can`t wait to be there. I have choosen all of my courses for September. There is one course that i don`t not want to take but i needed another 3 credits to finish the year. Who knows maybe i will like it. Anyways i have to get going. Have a good week!

Finally Student Loans are in! I am so happy that my loan has finally come in. I was getting pissed about it. I needed to pay for school and give my parents the money I loaned from them. But all is good. I had an amazing weekend. I got to spend time with my brother and my parents. I had the most amazing talks with them. I feel that everyone is part of the family again. I think I need to talk because we didn't do it enough while my mom was sick. I started opening the communication up with them. I feel that we are a family again. I did learn things about my brother and it kind of shocked me but that's ok. I also learned that my brother is going through some of the things I did went through as a teen. I really made great contact with my brother. To get going. I need to read some chapters in my death and dying book. Oh that didn't sound right. LOL. Anyways have a good day and night.
1980's Cartoons I was on the internet looking for some pictures from cartoons i use to watch as a kid. I found this website with a bunch of links to other sites. Enjoy! urlLink 1980's Cartoons

HOMEWORK?? Yes I have homework but I don't want to do it. I have like 5 long chapters in my Parties and Elections to do before tomorrow. Then I have three chapters in the same class to read before next Tuesday and do an assignment with that. This is what happens when you leave things at the last minute. I love to read but this book is so boring. Oh well it needs to be done. I am going home this weekend. I can't wait! Anyways I am going to go for now. Have a good day!

I DROPPED A COURSE I dropped my Deviance course. It was getting to be to much for me. I really didn't want to be there in the first place. I got an email from my cousin Sheila which i haven't talk to in a long time. The last time i saw her was about three years ago. That was the summer before i moved to Ontario. We had went out to the bars and went dancing. Anways i have to get to bed soon. So have a good day!

Feeling great Well things have been much better today. I had a good day at school. I am now waiting for my uncle Ed to get here. He has a few of my things from home. My mom is a little worried about me so maybe i will be going home this weekend. Uncle Ed will be taking me if i go. Anyways thats all for today. Have a wonderful day.

One Hell of a Day Well a lot of shit is going on. Lets just say things are very interesting. If you want to know more email me. But it depends who you are. There is some people i will tell a lot more to then others. I think everyone close to me would get a really kick out of it. It is just so crazy why do i get in this shit. Why me? Now that i think about it. It is just too funny. Humans can be so confusing and stupid at the same time. I have to say i was that kind of human for the last 2 days. But the good thing is that i am learning so much about myself. Which i think is a good thing. Some thing that i really was not thinking about in a long time. I know for sure that Brandi and i will be friends for life. Because of all the shit that has happened in the last two days and we haven't yelled at each other is a great sign. Love you Brandi, your like the sister to me. Well that is all for now. Have a good day. Hopefully better then mine.

Trust?? Do you trust everybody you know? That is the question. I know there is a few people in my life that i don't trust. There is a few people who have lied to me. So i have lost that trust in them. Don't get me wrong i don't dislike any them but i would never tell them anything about me or my personal life. What do you think trust is suppose to be? Tell me what you think.

So Tired! I need sleep! I haven't been sleeping well at all lately. I think its because there has been to much stress. Today i was up at 5:30am and i couldn't get back to sleep. I felt like sleeping through class. So i went to bed at 12 last night and i had a total of 5 and half hours. Once Brandi is done class we will go home. I need to take a nice long two hour nap this afternoon. Well i am going to go and do some homework. Have a nice day!

Feeling better Well i had a crappy week. Things didn't go the way they should have but things will get better. Emotions are runny high here at our place. Everyone needs to take it easy. I just need to relax. I dropped out of one of my classes today. So school will not be so stressful. I talked to my mom yesterday and we did a lot of talking. I got a lot of my feeling out. Which felt so good. My brother has a girlfriend now. Which is kind of weird. I always though of him as a little kid. But his growing up. Well thats all for today. Have a good day!

Why me ? Why do things happen the way that they do? Why do these things happen to me? I don't want to feel this way. I need to put things behind me, that i know. But how? Do i have to do what i want. I guess i should face that fear. I should have faced my fears and that i kind of regret not doing so. But i do know that i did the right thing. Which is the right for me now. I got an email tonight from someone i know. He told me that it was normal for me to feel the way i do. I have to met him after classes tomorrow. I am looking forward to that. He can help me with the questions that have been in my mind. I am getting there. I am about 70% of fully being myself again. I also have fears of losing myself again. But those fears are slowly going away. I have so much support from my roommates. Brenda, Brandi and Linda have been a big help. Without them i don't know what would have happened. Since i have been here things have been good. But yesterday things were falling apart. I want to just scream and cry. Maybe thats what i need to do. Just maybe I have to get things out. But if i do, will I feel weak or maybe i would feel stronger. who knows!

Still Living with only 4 hours of sleep. I think i have been doing to much drinking in the last two days. Not feeling so good today. I had a great time last night. I met Jamie and Holly yesterday. They are amazing people. Its funny how things work out sometimes. Life has thrown so many curve balls in my life. Well i have to go. I am talking to my parents. Have a good day!

Some questions that need answers I went to see swat at the movies last night. It was really good. Brandi met Jason yesterday and he took us to the movies. Which was really nice of him. After that we played pool. I had a great time. We also met Jeff, Jason's roommate. We had fun and did a lot of talk...well i did a lot of talking. I just couldn't shut up. What is my problem??? please friends be honest with me. Am i some bitch that can't shut up? I have been questioning myself since last week. I need to change things in my life. Since i have been in Fredericton things have been so much better. I am having the most amazing conversation with Robin. Thanks Robin you always know how to make me feel so much better. Your an amazing friend. Love and miss you!! Well thats all for today.....have a good day!

September 11th Wow September 11th. Everyone knows about it. I heard some people say they are sick of hearing about it. I understand why people don't want to here about it. I like to talk about because i like to know more info about it. I knew someone who's parents lived in DC not far from where the plane had crashed. I was in my computer class when i found out. Bailey and I went out to lunch and listened to the radio. Then we left class and went to my house to watch it on TV. The famous question was where were you when you found out?

grrrr...student loans! I will talk about what is going on with student loans. I have fax them the letter that they needed. This time i didn't forget my SIN number. I wrote them a nice letter and printed up. I am hoping they will have my loan done by next week. I have been mad about student loans and its not as bad as Brenda. Brenda found out yesterday that she had to reapply because OSAP made a mistake. The university its helping her get it faster. She is hoping to have it around the same time as me. Anyways i am going to get going. Have a good day!

NOOOOOO ITS NOT OVER!!!! Well i got a call from OSAP and i am missing something on my application. So i sent them a letter to explan things but of course i forgot to put my SIN number on it. So now i have to fax some the letter again to them. So that made my day even more crazy. My death and dying course is pretty cool. I know i will enjoy it and it is an easy course. Anyways i have to get some homework done. Have a goodnight!

What a Day! and it still not over.... Well just got out of Parties and Elections class. Brandi is in class so i am waitting for her to get out of class. I have an hour and a half to kill. So i decided to write on my blog since i didn't write anything since Sept 4th. On Friday September 5th i went to my french class which was level 2. As everyone who is close to me knows i speak french very well. I took a lower level course because i have to practice my french writting. Maybe i should take a English course for my english writting too..lol. Anyways the teacher told me that i needed to go into a higher level course. So she told me to leave. Can you beileve that i was kicked out of class because i was too good for the course. So i told my mom on the phone the other night that i was kicked out of the class. She said " WHAT ?" So i laughed and told her why. I think she though i got into trouble. Today will be the first day in which i will be going to my Death and Dying course. Some people have told me that it was a good course. I will just have to wait and see. So now i am just wanting for Brandi to finish class so we can go to the death and dying course. Oh Brandi and i are taking the course together. Classes today went well. I realized that i need to read up on Canadian political science again. I forgot a lot of it since 1999. There was a lot of stuff Heather said that i remember but there is a lot that i forgot. Student loans are STILL not in. I am a little pissed with them about it. I still don't have any money for books. Books are going to cost about $600 dollars. $600!!!! Can you believe that! it just plain nuts. This girl that i met today said her friend is paying $129 per book and she has 7 to buy. You do the math. So i realized that i was crazy to come back to university. Oh well it better be good and i get a great paying job after all this crap. Well i never seen any of my old friends but thats because they have finished and graduated last year. It would have been great to see them again. Oh well sometimes you can't keep in touch with everyone. I met a few nice people so far. Also i met some people that are not on the same level as me. I feel that i am getting old even if i am only 23. There is just so many youths. Most of them are not even the age to drink or buy smokes. So i try to stay away from those groups. Don't get me wrong there is nothing wrong with them. But i don't want to be at a party with a bunch of people who under age. Thats just not right. Maybe its because i have worked with youth from 15 to 18. They were my friends but again they are not on the same level as me. Do you understand what i am trying to say? Well i am going to get going. I am just saying stuff so i wouldn't be so bored. Anyways have a good day! Miss you all!

First Day of School! Well i was at the university today. I went to two of my courses. I was so happy to be back on the STU campus again. Today i had two class which are Intro to Gender Studies 2013 and Parties & Elections 3103. I really like these classes. I also like the teachers which is good. Anyways this is my classes for semester 1. Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays From 1:30pm to 2:20pm French From 2:30pm to 3:20pm Deviance Tuesdays and Thrusdays From 8:30am to 9:50am Intro to Gender Studies From 10:00am to 11:20am Parties & Elections 3 hour Class on Tuesday From 2:30 pm to 5:20 pm Death and Dying So thats what is happening so far. Anyways i have to get going. Have a good day! Peace and Love!
Try this out! urlLink Homestar Quiz
Getting Mid-Term back! Well today i am getting my death and dying mid-term back. Wish me luck! Have to get to class see ya!

Creations for the year of 2004 Well I have been thinking about what I will be doing in 2004. Here is my list: 1. University 2. Working with PHL (Down Syndrome Project and other things) 3. Try to quit smoking (Like that's going to happened....lol but I do want to try.) 4. Gettting a summer job 5. Getting into the Social Worker program in September 6. If not in the program I will be continuing my BA Thats about it for now.

Working in Bathurst! Well this coming weekend I will be working again. This is the last time until 2004. Can't wait! Brandi and I will be the only ones going this time. Its nice that I am working and traveling at the same time. I am able to see cities and towns that I only heard of. We are leaving on Thursday.

Working in St-John, N.B. this weekend! Well i am working this weekend. Brenda, Linda and Brandi are also. They are leaving at 12:30 to go but i am only leaving at 10 am Saturday because i have a class at 1:30pm tomorrow. I can't miss this class anymore. I can't wait because i have never been to this part of St-John. Well i have to go. Have a great day!
No More Cable Internet we will have Vibe High Speed Internet! Well we where not to happy with cable internet. It wouldn't work half of the time. So we ordered Vibe. It is so much better then cable.

Went to the eye doctor today! Well i went to the eye doctor today and it cost $60. She told me that my vision in my eyes went down but not by much. So that was good news. The bad news is that it costs $189 for 6 months. I will not go back to this place after i buy these lens. I am going to go back to the doctor i had at home. I would pay about $220 for a year there. So i will not be returning to this doctor here in Fredericton. Anyways i have to get going to class. Have a good day!

Fire Alarm at St-Thomas University Again things have to happen when Brandi and I hanging out waiting for class or walking down the street. I think we are just having bad luck for the past month or so. Anyways we were sitting outside at the smoking corner. Yes we have a smoking corner because the university people said that too much smoke was getting into the buildings. Whatever! Anyways on with the story. As I said we were at the smoking corner when the fire alarm went off at the urlLink Harrington Hall. Then we seen people come out of that dorm dressed in their PJ's on. About 5 minutes later these two firemen came up to us and asked us where Harrington Hall is. What was that about??? STU is like the smallest university in Canada I think. STU has 4 offices and classroom buildings. Four residence buildings and one is off campus and a fitness center. That's 8 buildings on campus and one off campus. Plus the alarm was going off. How could they not know which building??? I didn't mine telling them but its kind of stupid when all the people came out of that building and standing right there outside in front of Harrington hall. Anyways it was a weird morning. I am going to my parents house for the long weekend. So have a great weekend! I know I will. Happy thanksgiving!

I am so sick with a cold! I got a cold and my whole body is not feeling well. Found out today that Brandi is also sick. I think i gave her my cold. Anyways i hope people are feeling better then me. I need to get some work done. I promise to write more the next time. Have a goodnight!

Brandi and I almost DIED yesterday Well Brandi and I went downtown. If you know Fredericton we were on Regent St going towards downtown area. We were almost at the corner of George and Regent. Then we see this shitty ass red car go through the RED light and of course there is a big ass truck coming the other way on the green light. Well the both hit then of course the red car is coming towards Brandi and I. Well the car hit the pole that was about 5 feet away from us. Thank god we were not 30 seconds faster because we would have been right in front of that telephone pole. Brandi and I where both in shock for most of the night. We couldn't believe that we where so lucky to be alive. Thankfully no one was serious hurt. Anyways have a good night.

This is my life from the today to the 10th of December 28th French class and work on essay 29th Work on essay 30th Work on essay 1st French class and work on essay 2nd Political Science class, Death and dying class and study for french written test 3rd French written test and read paper for french oral test 4th French oral test and study for exams 5th Study for exams 6th Study for exams 7th Study for exams 8th Study for exams' 9th 9:00am Political Science exam, 2:00pm Death and dying exam and pack to go home 10th Going home for the break!

So close yet so far! Well I have one week of school left. I will be done classes on the 3rd of Dec. I have two exams on the 9th of December. I can't wait to be done. I will have to complete two projects by the 2nd. I am almost done one. Amanda emailed me and asked me if I wanted to come up to Edmundston with her. I would really love to but I have to stay home and get my projects done. I handed in my death and dying project already so that's done. It was an interesting project to do. Anyways I have to go and see my French professor and catch the bus. So I will catch you later! Have a great day!

Things have been a little crazy! I have been doing a lot of homework this past week. I just finished my death and dying project. This weekend i will be doing my last class assignment for Parties and Elections. Then i will have two other projects to do for my Political Science class then i am will be done. The last day of classes is December 3rd. I have two exams on the 9th of Dec. I will be going to my parents house on the 10th of Dec until sometime in Janurary. Anyways i have to go. Have a good weekend!

Moving Once Again! Well I am moving once again. I am still going to the university but I will be moving to just outside of Fredericton. It will be a lot of traveling but i will be at peace there. My life has been a little busy and i can't seem to get things done. So i get a little upset about that. Anyways i have to get going. I have homework to do.

Crazy things have happened! Well the last two weeks have been crazy and busy. I was working and now I have left that job. I have been thinking about my life and university. I have decided to change my course to a BA in political science and maybe human rights. Then do my Social Work degree after I am done my BA. So by the time I am done school I should be 28. Wow I can't believe that!!! Well I will have three diplomas. one from urlLink SLC two from urlLink STU.

One More Exam to go! Well i just finished my political science exam. I think i did good. I will know my mark is already 80% in the class. I will know all of my grades by this weekend. Anyways i have to go to the next exam. Good luck to all those who is writting. Bye for now!

No ones here! I came to St-Thomas this morning and no one was around. Well since yesterday was the last day of classes, i guess everyone was sleeping this morning. You ask why i am here? I have to do an oral exam for french. Yes me who is half french and half english. It stupid to come into town in the morning for 5 mins. I know that i will do well. I speak french like a speak english. So i shouldn't have any problems. No one is even on MSN. I think its too early in the morning to be here. There is a total of 6 people in the computer room. Its funny because yesterday i had to wait in line just to check my email. People wait last minute to do there essays. What is that about? why do we as students wait at the last minute to do everything? I had a 15 page paper at the begining of this week. You know what? i started it the day before. I think i need to get my ass in gear and get my papers done before. Ya right like thats going to happened. I always said it but never do it. Just like i said i want to quit smoke. Anyways i am going to go. Have a good day!

I can't believe it and brrrr its cold! Wow the last day of school. It has went by so fast. I handed in my 15 page paper to my professor. I am proud of it too. Anyway i have to get going. Have to study from my exam tomorrow. I just wanted to write a quick note. Have a nice cold day!!!
Sorry about that! Sorry but the comments are not working.....i hope they will be up and running again by tomorrow.

Well I think I failed! Well I had a psychology lab today and I think I failed. But all is ok we have a optional lab at the end if the year to replace one we did really bad on. I think I will have to study a lot harder the next time. I have a mid-term in psych and a French test on Monday. Wow I have a lot of studying this weekend to do. My uncle is away for the next 9 days, he went to Toronto. So I have the house to myself which is nice. But it's going to be weird that he will not be there. I didn't sleep well last night. I had a weird dream. My grand-mother who passed away was in the dream and she was very much alive in this dream. We where in this house that I have never seen before. But it was weird because it felt like home. I think my grand-mother is trying to tell me something but I don't know what. It's all too weird. Anyways I have to get to class. Have a nice day!

It's about time that it is nice and sunny! I am really getting sick of the weather we are having. I don't hate the snow what i hate the cold and the wind chill. This past month we have been having crazy weather. I can't wait until spring comes. School is going well. I do have a alot of reading but that's ok. I can't wait until the first week of March because we have the whole week off of school. I will be spending that time with my parents. I am going home for the whole week. My brother is lucky because he has this week off of school. Next week he will be starting a new semester. Anyways i have to go for now. Have a great day! Take Care!

I tried!!! I did a really did! Well it's back to smoking again. I tried and I failed but that ok. I will try again! I need to do this for me. I felt so good when I was not smoking. I didn't have that taste in my mouth. It was nice when I would brush my teeth and they would stay clean. Anyways we are have one heck of a snow storm. I am happy I don't have school tomorrow. One of my uncle's friend died so we are going to Edmundston maybe tomorrow for the day. Anyways I have a lot more to say but I will keep it for Wednesday or Friday. Have a good day!

I want a smoke! Well its been 4 days that i haven't had a smoke and its driving me mad. But all will be ok. Things are a little tense right now. I have a lot to do and my damn student loans are not in right now. I am starting to hate school. There has been just too much shit this year. Anyways i think i am experiencing too much stress and i need some sleep. I haven't been sleeping well. Have a nice day!

Wow that's nuts! My Law, Power & Global Politics class is going to be friggin' hard. I can't wait to see what his going to come up with next. The Final exam is 40%. Man that's going to kill me. I will pray that he doesn't have differcult tests and that he doesn't mark hard. Anyways i am going to have lunch and go to french class Have a good day!

Back to School once again! Wow...I can't believe christmas break is gone and now its 2004! This is the courses i have so far. Law, Power & Global Politics Introduction aux textes (French) Introduction to Psychology I don't think i will pick up anything else. Have a HAPPY NEW YEAR! Note to Brandon! Don't worry i forgave you a long time ago. But i don't want anymore of the crap! I will try to give you a call tonight if not tonight then sometime is week. I put you back on to my msn. I am only on it during the day. I don't have internet at home. Talk to you later.

Mid-terms! Well I have two mid-terms this week. One in French and the other in Law, Power and Global Politics. So wish me luck!! I think I am going to need it. One more day of school on Friday and then it March break. I can't wait! My parents and I are going to a small family party for my birthday. I get my gifts next week before my birthday. My birthday is on March 11 and I will be back here in Fredericton by then. I think I will be going to Edmundston with Uncle Ed. If he can get the day off on Monday he will go. If not then I will be taking the bus. It's been awhile since I have taking the bus to Edmundston. The last time was in December of 2000. Anyways I have to get to class and I have to do a bit of studying before my French mid-term. Have a nice day!

Nine Layers This was interesting and i wanted to share it with you. LAYER ONE • Name: Andrea Berube • Birthdate: March 11, 1980 • Birthplace: Toronto, Ontario Canada • Current Location: New Brunswick Canada • Eye Color: green • Hair Color: Brown • Righty or Lefty: righty • Sun Sign: Pisces • Innie or Outtie: innie LAYER TWO • Your heritage: French and Native • The shoes you wore today: Boots. • Your hair: long • Your eyes: green and i wish they where a different colour. • Your weakness: Pop • Your fears: talking in front of a big crowd • Your perfect pizza: mushrooms, bacon and ham • One thing you'd like to achieve: learn to play piano and finish university. LAYER THREE • Your most overused phrase on IM: the happy face • Your first waking thoughts: I don't want to get up • The first feature you notice in the opposite sex: eyes • Your best physical feature: my hair • Your bedtime: about 11 p.m. or so • Your greatest fear: death • Your greatest accomplishment: finishing college • Your most missed memory: i don't know LAYER FOUR • Pepsi or Coke: Pepsi • McDonald's or Burger King: McDonald's • Single or group dates: single • Adidas or Nike: neither • Lipton Ice Tea or Nestea: doesn't matter • Chocolate or vanilla: both • Cappuccino or coffee: both LAYER FIVE • Smoke: yes • Cuss: sometimes • Sing: nope • Take a shower everyday: yes • Have a crush(es): no • Who are they: n/a • Do you think you've been in love: yes • Want to go to college: i did already • Like high school: not too much • Want to get married: maybe someday • Believe in yourself: yes always • Type with your fingers on the right keys: yes • Think you're attractive: i'm average • Think you're a health freak: no. • Get along with your parents: yes • Play an instrument: no LAYER SIX: In the past month, did you... • Drink alcohol: Yes • Smoke: yes • Do a drug: no • Make Out: yeah • Go on a date: no • Eat an entire box of Oreos: no • Eat sushi: no • Been on stage: no • Been dumped: no • Gone skating: no • Made homemade cookies: yes • Been in love: no, not in the last six months • Gone skinny dipping: no • Dyed your hair: no • Stolen anything: no LAYER SEVEN: Have you ever... • Played a game that required removal of clothing: no • If so, was it mixed company: n/a • Been trashed or extremely intoxicated: yes • Been caught "doing something": yes • Been called a tease: no • Gotten beaten up: no • Shoplifted: no • If so, did you get caught: n/a • Changed who you were to fit in: no LAYER EIGHT • Age you hope to be married: sometime in my 30's • Numbers and Names of Children: don't have any • Describe your Dream Wedding: small wedding with only my closest friends and family members attending • How do you want to die: no pain • Where you want to go to college: done that, i was at St-Lawrence College in Brockville Ont. • What do you want to be when you grow up: some kind of worker • What country would you most like to visit: many of them. LAYER NINE • Number of guys I have kissed: 3 • Number of boyfriends you've had: 2 • Number of drugs taken illegally: maybe i didn't or maybe i did. • Number of people I could trust with my life: 5 • Number of CDs that I own: over 100 • Number of piercings: two in each ear • Number of tattoos: none • Number of times my name has appeared in the newspaper: 3 • Number of scars on my body: one that i know of. • Number of things in my past that I regret: i regret moving in with friends at the begining of the school year.

Not feeling so great! Well there is not much to tell. Just wanting to let you all know that i am still alive even if i feel like crap. Didn't sleep well last night either. Well last Friday Jean took me out for a beer. It was every nice of him. My mom hasn't called in almost three days which is really weird. I think i will give her a call tonight. I guess there is nothing new going on at home therefore that is why she is not calling, I think. If you want to talk about something interesting. Just leave a comment and i can talk about it on the webpage. Anyways i have to get going. Have a good day!

The weekend coming once again! Well tomorrow is Valentine's Day! The day of LOVE. Happy Valentine's Day to everyone! I hope everyone has someone to spend it with. I got my french test back. I didn't do that great but i did pass. Nothing more to write. Have a great weekend!

What a day! The day has been long and boring plus I am so tired. I didn't sleep well at all last night. You know when you are tired and want to sleep but you can't. Well that's what happened and I was up like every hour or so. It just is not fair. Also what is not fair is that I got a crap load of homework to do. I never get much homework and today the professors decided to give a lot. I hardly get any homework in French and he assigned three things to do for Friday. Anyways i am going to go home. Have a good day.

I PASSED! Well i got my mark back in Psychology and i passed. I was so sure that i had failed. Anyways this day became better once i found out i did good on my mid-term. I am still waiting for my mark for my french mid-term. Have a nice weekend! Take Care!

Places in which i have visited in the US! urlLink create your own visited states map or urlLink write about it on the open travel guide Too bad their is not one for Canada. I have been to Ontario, Quebec, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia and New Foundland. The only place that i have not been at in the east is PEI. I don't have plans on going there maybe this summer or the next summer. I also need to visit the states more often.

Tired but all is good! Well there is nothing much to tell but i will find out today what i got on my mid-term. My website is fixed and running well again. I have the next four day off. I don't have any schoo friday. Like i said i don't have much to say but i needed to write something because i will not be able to until Monday. Well i am going to go for now. Have a nice day!
Change the template! Well as you see i have changed the template. I was thinking it needed a change so here it is enjoy! I will fix it up and put in the links and stuff. By Wednesday sometime!

Well i think i failed! Yup i think i failed my psychology mid-term! Why did i take psych anyways? Well i needed another course to be a full time student so i thought i could do this psych course. Well lets say that i did so much better in psych in college. I really think the teacher is not so great. Oh well i will get it one day. I also have a french test this after noon and i think i will do well on it. All i ask is to pass. Better news The weather is hot hot hot. Its like +2 outside and it so nice to be out there. We also have no classes on Friday because it Chancellor's day. What in the heck is Chancellor's day? If anyone knows please tell me. Anyways i have to get going. I have a french test to do. Wish me luck! Have a nice day! Take Care!
Comments are up and running again. I had to get a new comments program into my new webpage. The other one was not wowrking anymore. Hope you like it. Enjoy! have a good day!

Courses below! I have all courses lined up for next year. 1st term is going to be ok. But the 2nd term will be hard because all of the courses i need to take on on Monday, Wednesdays and Fridays. The days will be every long. But i don't have a choice i need those credits and courses for my major. Well nothing new happened lately. Amanda is coming this weekend and i can't wait. I am done classes on April 7th therefore i only have 3 days of school left. Anyways have a good day!

Courses for next year! But it could change again! Term 1 Mondays FRENCH-2306 Textes: niveau 2 at 11:30AM to 12:20PM POLS-2606 International Relations at 12:30PM to 1:20PM Tuesdays SCWK-2023 Introduction to Social Work at 8:30am to 9:50am POLS-3413 The European Union & Europe at 1:00PM to 2:20PM Wednesdays POLS-2703 Philosophy of Human Rights at 9:00am to 10:20am FRENCH-2306 Textes: niveau 2 at 11:30AM to 12:20PM POLS-2606 International Relations at 12:30PM to 1:20PM Thrusdays SCWK-2023 Introduction to Social Work at 8:30am to 9:50am POLS-3413 The European Union & Europe at 1:00PM to 2:20PM Fridays POLS-2703 Philosophy of Human Rights at 9:00am to 10:20am FRENCH-2306 Textes: niveau 2 at 11:30AM to 12:20PM POLS-2606 International Relations at 12:30PM to 1:20PM Term 2 Mondays HMRT-2003 Introduction to Human Rights at 10:30AM to 11:20AM FRENCH-2306 Textes: niveau 2 at 11:30AM to 12:20PM POLS-2606 International Relations at 12:30PM to 1:20PM POLS-3213 New Brunswick Politics at 1:30PM to 2:20PM POLS-3133 Constitution:Charter at 3:30PM 4:50PM Tuesdays No Classes Wednesdays HMRT-2003 Introduction to Human Rights at 10:30AM to 11:20AM FRENCH-2306 Textes: niveau 2 at 11:30AM to 12:20PM POLS-2606 International Relations at 12:30PM to 1:20PM POLS-3213 New Brunswick Politics at 1:30PM to 2:20PM POLS-3133 Constitution:Charter at 3:30PM 4:50PM Thrusdays No Classes Fridays HMRT-2003 Introduction to Human Rights at 10:30AM to 11:20AM FRENCH-2306 Textes: niveau 2 at 11:30AM to 12:20PM POLS-2606 International Relations at 12:30PM to 1:20PM POLS-3213 New Brunswick Politics at 1:30PM to 2:20PM POLS-3133 Constitution:Charter at 3:30PM 4:50PM

What a weekend! I had a pretty busy weekend. The weekend was there and then it was gone. I had two essays to write. An eight to ten pages essay for Law, Power and Global Politics and a small one page for French. But things are all good. I will be done school on April 7. I can't wait. Plus Amanda is coming to Fredericton this weekend. I can't wait to see her. Anyways I have to jet. Have a nice day!
Movie is canceled! Well tonight our French class was suppose to watch a movie but the teacher canceled it. Anyways that all for today!

Class was canceled for the after noon! Well I only had one class today. My French class was canceled because of some fair that is going on. It is nice because I get to go home earlier. I am working hard at getting my essay done for my law, power and global politics class. My essay is about the International Criminal Court. It is an interesting topic. Anyways I will be going home now. Have a good day!

Things to check out! urlLink President Bush of doing a "terrible job" of tackling terrorism. urlLink Foreigners in Iraq have been the repeated target of attacks. urlLink 'Al-Qaeda hideout' tunnels found. urlLink Rwanda to list 'most wanted 300'.

Nothing much to say! Everything is going well. I did two mid-terms and I passed on both of them. I also did a Psyc Lab today and I did well on that also. I think I will be going home for Easter this year. Then I will be back for my last two exams on the 16th of April. On the 17th I will be going home for the summer. Can't wait for that....I am tired of studying all the time. Amanda will be coming to Fredericton next weekend. I can't wait to see her. I haven't seen her since Christmas. We will be going out to some bar here in town. I haven't went out in a long time. Anyways that's all for now. Have a good weekend!
Happy Saint Patrick's day! Happy St-Paddy Day to everyone. Drink green beer for me! Because i can't.

What a crazy and funny day! I was at the mall with a friend today and she picked up some black dye for her hair. She wanted me to dye it for her. So i did and it turned out pretty good. So after that we took the bus but then i realized we took the wrong bus. It was pretty funny. Anyways the bus took us to down town and not to the university. So my friend decided to get a lip piecing that she always wanted. Then we came back to the school. So that what happened today other then school. Have to go because i have to get home. Have a good day!

A New Day! Well things are going pretty good. I did a mid-term for Psychology. I hope and pray that i pass. That's all i am asking. The only new thing that has happened this week so far is that i made a new friend. Well that's all for now. Have a good day!

Can you believe it! My mom forgot my birthday yesterday. I had to tell her. I wasn't even mad about it. It was funny. This is the first time it has happened in my life. I guess everything needs to happen once in life. It has been snowing all day today. But it's not staying on the ground. I hope this is our last snow storm of the winter. School is ok. I have been doing better in Psychology but i have been doing worst in French. Hopefully i can bring up my mark on the next test. Other then that there is nothing new. So i will go for now. Have a good weekend!

March 11th is the day i was born! Well just to let you know that tomorrow i will be turning 24. I can't believe it because i don't feel that old. Most of the people i know here at the university are younger. There is just one person that is older then me. Other then that there is nothing new. Well i have to get to class. So have a good day!

The List of Stuff I had a list of stuff in which i was going to do by the year 2004. It was written in October 27th of urlLink last year! I have only done number 1 and number 3. Plans have changed and number 2 is not going to happen. Well that's all for now!

Back to school! Well I am back in Fredericton. I am happy to be back to school because I know there is only a month left. Things have been going well. I didn't do any homework at all last week. I was busy and never home Note to Brandon and Bailey! Sorry I didn't call. I wasn't home much. Tell me what day and the time you would like me to call you. Well I have to get to class. Have a nice day!

What's in the News! urlLink New Brunswick farmer grows low-carb potatoes. Finally something happening in NB. urlLink One-eighth of bird species at risk which is not good. Check it out! urlLink Canada in Haiti. Of course we knew this would happened. They have said on the radio that they will be sending soldiers from Kingston, Gagetown and a few other places. Ottawa would like to send 400 soldiers. urlLink Rockets fired at U.S. Baghdad headquarters. This doesn't surprise me one bit. Click to read. urlLink Flooding in Quebec. Quebec always seems to get that crap. urlLink Mr. Dell steps down as CEO. If you own a dell computer you should read this because it is interesting to know.

Something i read today! I was reading something from website of a person i know in Brockville. urlLink Chad was talking about how people view people and how they view you. Read his entry for March 4th. It is interesting what he says. I agree with him. But it is the way things are and how our society is. Well i am going to be 24 in a week. I getting old. I have a secret for you. I have never told anyonw this. But i have a fear of getting old. Be cause if i am getting old then so is everyone i love and care for. I do not feel 24. I think that is because i have been working with kids and teens since the year 2000. Oh well getting old is not going to stop me from living. I have not even started homework yet. My cousin invited me to go for a ride to the public library. It is so nice and warm out here. Anyways i have to get going. Have a nice day!

March Break! Nothing much to say but I am happy that I got to a computer. I really missed it. It is nice to be home with my family. I didn't realized how much I miss this town. Yes I did miss it and I can't believe it. The town I hated since high school and I missed it. I think I will be getting some movies for tonight. I think we should have movie night since my brother is going to be home. I got to drive the car today which was nice. I missed driving. I can't wait until this summer because I will have a car to drive. I haven't even open any of my text books since I have been here. I just don't feel like doing any of it. I will have to do some homework. I think I will get something done tomorrow. Well I have to get going. Have a nice day everyone!

Sorry but things just happen! I am sorry to those people who do read my webpage. I have been a little busy and my mom is in the hospital. So things have been crazy. I go to visit my mom everyday. So that takes a bit of my time. I always have things to do and i don't seem to find time to write. But i promise things will get better by the end of this week and i will write more often. What's new? well other then my mom being sick there nothing new. I am currently looking for a job. I am hoping that i will be working by May. For all of those who pray please say a little prayer for me and for my mother. Well i better get some sleep. Have a good day!

Finally Home!!! Well i am home and i have the internet but my computer is a piece of crap. I am not able to check my hotmail or download msn messager. I am only able to check my university email. I am happy that i can even write anything on my website. It's time for a new computer. But all is good because i am hoping to get one this fall. I need to get one this fall because this computer will drive me crazy. Anyways i have to get going. Need to unpack stuff. Have a good night!

Finally exams are done! All my exams are done. I am so happy. I get to go home for the summer. I have to pack tonight since i have not done that yet. Its going to be a long night because i have to wash some clothes also. I am so tired right now but all is good. My parents should be here before lunch tomorrow. Anyways i have a few things to do and then i need to get home because its 9:00pm. The exam was ok. I think i passed. We will have to wait and see. Have a good week. I will try to write a often as i can.

Doing Exams! Been busy this morning getting one of my exams done. It went good and I was happy the way things went. I still have one exam to do at 7 pm. What is up with that! Who wants to do and exam at 7. Anyways I am hoping to be out of the exam by 9 pm this evening. Anyways there is new pics on my photo page. Just click the pictures link. There is more recent pics like from my brothers grad pics. Well that's all for now. Maybe if I have time I will write to tell you how the exam went. Have a good day!

The LAST day! It's the last day of the term. I can't beileve that the school year is over already. It just seems like yesterday that it was September. Well i got a phone call from mom last night. She told me that Jaime is in NB. She wanted to know where I live so that she could come and visit me. I hope i will be able to see her today because i am leaving tomorrow for Edmundston. I hope everyone will have a great Easter. I have to go. Have a good day!

1 MORE DAY OF SCHOOL LEFT! Well I am done school tomorrow. I haven't had much to do. I will be studying all of next week. I have two exams to do. I did my oral French exam today. I have a French test tomorrow. On Thursday I will be leaving for Edmundston. Other then that nothing new is going on. They only thing that I will be doing is apply for Mount Allison University. Anyways have a good day!
Finally got a photo page! I got a fotopage and i have a few pics on it. You can check it out. Click on Pictures! Once i get more pics scanned i will put them up.

Maybe transferring to Mount Allison University! Well I have been talking to a few people and I was thinking about going to Moncton. I talked to Amanda about it and I talked to my parents. So anyways I will learn more about this once I get the information that I need. But wish me luck and pray that everything will be ok. I have today, tomorrow and the next day of school left. So I will be done on Wednesday. I will be going home for a week then I will be back for exams. Anyways I have to get to class. Have a good day!

Forgot my Keys! Well i was a little ticked with myself because i forgot my keys and i had to come back to the school. My uncle is working so i have to wait for an hour or so. Oh well! This is the first time it's happened. It can't happen again. Anyways i have to go call my uncle and see if he will come and pick me up.

Plans for the weekend! Well maybe you know that Amanda's coming here on Saturday. I have been saying it so many times before. I can't wait to see her. Plus i get to meet her new boyfriend. Other then that there is nothing new. I get to relax all weekend. I have no major projects or essays to do. I have a oral french exam and a written one next week. I have 3 more days until school is over. Wish me luck for the exams. On Monday i will have something interesting to talk about. I have to get to class. Have a great weekend.

Movies I have seen in the last few weeks! urlLink Sherk 1 (Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Eddie Murphy, and Cameron Diaz) I really liked this movie because it was so well done. All the actors voices were amazing. I rate this movie a A-. urlLink The Core (Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Delroy Lindo, Bruce Greenwood and Stanley Tucci) This movie was good but it didn't seem real. It is not possible for people to go to the core the earth and survive. It was still an interesting movie to watch. I give this one a C. urlLink The Hunted (Tommy Lee Jones and Benicio Del Toro) Great movie with a lot of action. It also has a great fighting scene at towards the end of the movie. The movie does seem to have a lot of blood in it. I give this one a B-. urlLink The Master of Disguise (Dana Carvey, Jennifer Esposito and James Brolin) This movie really sucked! I was hoping it would have been good. Dana Carvey did I much better job in Wayne's World. Anyways I am giving this one a D. urlLink Bowling for Columbine (Michael Moore, Marilyn Manson and Charlton Heston) This is the best documentary that i have ever seen. Michael Moore is on a mission to find out why in the US is there so many murders. Michael says that over 11 000 people died in the US each year because of guns and murder. He wants to know why? His answer to this is because the media makes people so scared of other people. In this movie Michael comes to Canada to see how things work here. He found out that only about 200 people died each year in Canada because of guns and murder. He has seen that people here in Canada have no fear of people killing each other. There is about 10 million people in Canada and 7 million people own guns. It amazes him that Canada has such a low murder rate when 7 million people own guns. I think everyone should watch this movie. If you can handle the emotional parts of the movie you should rent it sometime. I even had tears in my eyes. This movie is shocking and sad at parts but it makes you see the reality of life in the US. I rate this movie an A+++. urlLink The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Lan McKellen, Viggo Mortensen and John Rhys-Davies) Well it is Lord of the Rings and other other movies were exellent so this one was also excellent. I rated this one a A++. urlLink Bringing Down The House (Queen Latifah, Steve Martin and Eugene Levy) This was an ok movie. I give this one a B+. urlLink Cheaper by the Dozen (Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt, Hilary Duff, Piper Perabo and Tom Welling) It was a great movie and it was very funny. It will makes you laugh! I rated this one a A-. Well that's all for now. If you want to leave a comment about any of these movies and what you though about them just click on Comments!

urlLink Lord of the Rings Wallpaper I have order the Lord of the Rings (The Return of the King). I can't wait to get it i still haven't seen it yet. I didn't even go to the movies to see it. I knew that i would buy it so that's why i decided to wait to see it.

I though this was pretty cool. I got it from Katie's webpage. This is my diagnosed. Being Bored! Well last week I worked 6 days and this week I am only working 2 days. I guess things are slow this week. On the 29th and the 30th of May i will be doing a First Aid and CIPRO course. Anyways I don't have much to report because i spend the last 3 days at home. I hope something more interesting happens this weekend. Have a great day!

I still can't believe it! I don't talk much about politics and what is going on around the world because some people find it boring. It's interesting to me but not always to others. I have to talk about this. It affected me a lot because I just don't understand how people can be so evil. I heard this from someone at work. I haven't been listening to the news much because I have been so busy at work. urlLink Check this out and you will know what I mean!
New Comments Program! I have a new comments program which is located at the bottom of each post. Enjoy!

Work! Work! Working that's all I have been doing for the last little while. Its all good that's means more money for me. I have the day off tomorrow but i am maybe going to be called in always. They are going to need someone in the kicthen for sure tomorrow night. My dad is suppose to get the truck fix so I will be able to drive myself to work. My dad needs the other car. Even if I took him to work everyday and took the car it wouldn't work out because he finishes work before I do. So we need another car here for the summer anyways. Dad said that if its not too expensive he will keep the truck on the road even when I am gone to university. It would be nice bacause I still would be able to drive when i am here on the winter and spring break. Anyways I am going to go because i have the feeling that they are going to call me for work. Have a good night!

Gotta Job! Well things are going great this week. I applied for this job at Howard Johnsons and i got it. I will be working in the kicthen this summer. It's going to be interesting. One of my cousins works with me. We had a great time working the other night. I didn't get home until 12am but that's ok. Tomorrow i start at 10 in the morning so i will be home earlier. My brother is still looking for a job. He was suppose to go out and look for one this week but he didn't. Right now his friends seem to be more important then anything else. Oh well it his problem. My mom's birthday was last week and tomorrow its Mother's day. I wasn't able to get her anything but a card. Once i get my first pay check i am going out and getting her something really nice. Well i have to get going. Have a good day! Note to Katie! I am happy your have a new blog and writing again. Miss you!

Been soooo busy! I work so much that i am only home to come to bed. I am working 7 days a week. If it's not one job then its the other. I don't find anytime to relax. I found out today i don't have to work tomorrow because it's Canada day! So i have to whole day to myself. But i think i will be helping my mom paint the living room in the after noon. My brother is going to Bathurst tomorrow until Monday. My brother is also working a lot. But he got sometime off this week. Well i am going to get going. Oh by the way! LIB (RED): Jean-Claude D'Amours won by 44.74% NDP:(ORANGE) Rodolphe Martin came in second with 27.5% which has never happened before here in Edmundston. CON:(BLUE) Benoit Violette came in third with 24.05% and Jovette Cyr(The Green Party of Canada) came in last with 3.7% Note to Bailey! Sorry i didn't write to you. I will send you an email tomorrow. Explaining what is going on.

What i heard! This is something that i heard from someone else. But i found out that there is going to be someone who will running in the elections here. I still haven't seen any blue signs around yet. But there is still time. I will let you know once i found out who it is. Anyways i have to get few things done.

Madawaska-Restigouche Madawaska is the riding for my home town city. Get this! Jean-Claude D'Amours is the only who is running. Duh! i wonder who's going to win. LOL that's too funny. I was wondering this week why i had only seen Liberal signs up. I guess i answered my question. I guess i don't have to vote since there is only one candidate. It's just a waste of time!

Federal Elections! Election Day! I know i don't talk about Political stuff on my website because it can be boring for some people but since no one has been reading my webpage much I am going to cover the Federal elections. First thing i agree and disagree about! WHITBY, ONTARIO - Conservative Leader Stephen Harper said Tuesday he would get rid of the national gun registry and divert the money to strengthen law enforcement across the country. Speaking in a small Ontario town, the Conservative leader said it was time to get tough on crime and time to register sexual predators. This was taking from the CBC Website. I agree with strengthening of Law enforcement but get rid of national gun registry. Is it just me of is this guy nuts. Why in would he want to do that??? I think we have the best gun register system around. Second thing! Martin, who was in Vancouver unveiling his policy on seniors and people with disabilities, was questioned by reporters about a recent poll showing Liberals leading by just four points over the Conservatives. Martin defended his party's governing record over the past decade, but also admitted to mistakes. The Liberal government has been hammered over the sponsorship scandal and overspending on the gun registry. Ok that's nice since his getting old he wants something good in place when he retires. Overspending on gun registry! We need this gun registry. I don't want our country to end up like the States. Third! Marijuana Party gets campaign rolling with seed money! LOL just too funny!!! Thats about it for now. urlLink CBC Canada Votes!

Have a nice day!
New Member to my page! A friend of mine will be also writing things on this page. Maybe it will make it more interesting. Her name is Baby girl.

Tornado in New Brunswick Well we had a tornado in my area. It was kind of weird. I was at work at the time and I didn't know what happened. My dad picked me up from work and told me we had another tornado. We didn't have an damage around our place. My aunt Claire got it bad at her place. Her house is now on the ground. They were in the house when the tornado hit the house and it landed face first on the ground. No one was serious hurt. They were more in shock then anything. The house fell on the truck. At the time that this had happened. My Aunt was in the hall on the way to the living room. She fell into my cousin's bed room. My uncle had just finished supper and was in the kitchen. He fell against the oven and the table and fridge door fell on him. My cousin Serge and his girlfriend was in the living room at the time. My cousin Serge had a cut on his nose. Everyone else just had sore muscles. I will scan the pic that was in the newspaper and have it on my photo page by Friday. I will not be in color but in black and white. I will try to get one in color. Anyways I have to get some sleep right now. Have a good day.
